text: Achara may refer to: * Achara Takipur, a town in Farrukhabad district in the Indian State of Uttar Pradesh * Achara (clan), a Jat clan of Rajasthan * Ifunanyachi Achara (born 1997), Nigerian footballer * Kieron Achara (born 1983), Scottish basketball player * Adjara, an autonomous republic of Georgia * Atchara (also spelled as Atsara or Achara), pickled green papaya in Philippine cuisine * Ācāra, a concept used in Classical Hindu law.
title: Achara
